title: Tangler font?
content:
Can anyone tell me what the tangler font is:

[http://www.tangler.com/](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122303/http:/www.tangler.com/ "http://www.tangler.com/")

Thanks.

 [‹ (x) DIN-like font from older type specimen book - (similar to) Wilma {Stephen}](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122303/http:/typophile.com/node/28237 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) The Independent newspaper faces - ITC New Century, Whitney {Mike Y, Marc O} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20070908122303/http:/typophile.com/node/28932 "Go to next forum topic")
author: reboot

comments.content: the Tangler logo is probably custom. Or did you mean the font below the logo?

Whatever it is, the ’g’ seems waaay too narrow and doesnt really fit in there.

Dav

Yes, I did mean the actual logotype, I figured it might be custom. Out of interest, what is the text below it?

Thanks  
Lee
